prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Piano, Bass, Guitar, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Piano, Bass, and Guitar are the instruments featured in this song, but Drums are absent.

Style 2: This song is composed of Reed, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, but without Drums.

Style 3: This composition is comprised of Reed, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, omitting Drums.
